column7: A satisfactory visit in the neighbourhood
column9: Although it is hardly more than a neighbourhood kiosk, Chadis provides food in good portions at decent prices and, when it comes to pizzas, pleasantly surprises patrons by not using a kind of sweet cheese instead of something closer to mozzarella, even if not quite...More
I have to say that was best pizza I had in Lund Sweden and staff was fantastic , if you go there don't forget to try kebab pizza with delesiciouse colslow

Very Good kebab and very Nice staff and the price is unblevable :) 
Pizza you Schoultz try ;)
Do not forget to try shawerma as well

I have eaten here several times and also ordered food to my home. The personell are nice and the food is tasty. I would highly recommend it for backpackers and visiting students. Prices are very reasonable.
Maten va väl helt ok.Men hela lokalen behövde rustas upp och städas, ytterdörren är helt svart runt handtaget allmänt ofräscht.
